Description: Procession of Muslim pilgrims departing from Egypt for Mecca, led by mounted guards at right, followed by a camel carrying the ornate mahmal, and musicians riding camels, surrounded by onlookers on a rocky plateau; a town seen in background at right. Stencil-printed lithograph
Curator's comments: The printer's name appear on another impression (information from Mr Dietrich Hecht)
Bibliographic references: Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.124, fig.1)
Porter and Saif 2013 / The Hajj: Collected Essays (p.201 pl.12)
